title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a son-in-law in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Seeing a groom in a dream if he appears in a married woman’s dream differs from his appearance in an unmarried woman’s dream, because the social and psychological state of the dreamer enters into the interpretation and interpretation of the vision. The groom in a dream differs from one scholar and dream interpreter to another dream interpretation scholar, as we will explain. The interpretation of seeing a dream about glass in a dream... the end of marital troubles and troubles. The interpretation of seeing a son-in-law in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq says that a married woman who sees a groom proposing to her other than her current husband, This vision shows her dissatisfaction with the married life she is currently living. The groom’s proposal to the currently ill married woman may be a sign of the imminent death of that lady. Imam Al-Sadiq says that the groom’s strange proposal to the unmarried girl indicates that she will find a good job in the coming period. As for the advanced groom Ibn Sirin believes that the appearance of the groom in a married woman’s dream indicates that there are many changes Positivity in her life in the coming period. If the dreamer is a man who has a girl of marriageable age, then seeing the groom in the dream foretells that his daughter will get married in the near future. As for the appearance of the groom in a pregnant woman’s dream, this vision indicates that this woman will give birth to a male child. God alone He knows what is in the wombs. Interpretation of a dream of a stripper in a dream... the end of crises and the end of pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing a groom in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. If the dreamer sees a groom she does not know and does not feel happy and satisfied with this marriage, this may indicate that many negative changes will occur in this woman’s life. Women. The groom’s offer in a dream to a girl who is currently studying could be one of the signs that heralds her graduation in the near future. Seeing the groom wearing a white suit in a dream means that many happy and joyful occasions will come the dreamer’s way. If the groom who appears in the dream is Ugly or wearing dirty clothes, this indicates the coming of some problems and misfortunes for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a dream about the sun in a dream: marriage and upcoming joy soon. Interpretation of seeing a groom in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that the groom in the dream of an unmarried, engaged girl indicates her internal dissatisfaction with her current fiancé. And her dissatisfaction with marrying him. As for someone who dreams that her current fiancé returns, this indicates the girl’s strong attachment to her fiancé and her fear of losing him. As if a married woman saw in a dream that her husband was a groom proposing to her, this indicates the strength of love and emotional stability that existed in this woman’s life. The lady at that time.Interpretation of seeing a buffalo in a dream. In a dream... pregnancy soon and the sorrows will end. Interpretation of seeing the groom in a dream by Ibn Kathir. Interpretation of dreams for a fight in a dream. Close marriage and crises. Ibn Kathir believes that the appearance of the groom in a dream indicates a good travel opportunity that will appear in the dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream: The high priest died in the church

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that the high priest in the church has died, and seeing the priest or the church in a dream is one of the unusual visions in our society, but at the same time it is one of the visions that carry a wide range of different meanings and interpretations, which we will learn about in detail through today’s encyclopedia article Many people are looking for an explanation for seeing that the greatest priest of the church died in order to know what this vision holds for him, whether it is good or bad. Interpretation of seeing a priest or a phobia in a dream: Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a priest or a phobia is one of the visions that carries a number From different interpretations. Among these interpretations are the following: If a person sees in a dream that he has become a priest or a monk, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will reach a great position, gain great knowledge, and excel over his peers in the surrounding society, and their concerns and problems. But if a man sees in a dream that he Chasing a priest or a phobia, this vision suggests getting rid of the worries and problems that a person suffers from in his life. If a man sees in a dream that he is inside a church and sitting in it, this means that he is in a relationship with a woman of disrepute and it may indicate that he enters the house of an adulteress. But if one sees In a dream, the death of the high priest or a monk in the church, this means that the dreamer will get rid of the illness and problems that he suffers from in his life, but if he sees that he is going to bury him, then this vision indicates the death of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the church in a dream according to Imam Al-Nabulsi: Imam Al-Nabulsi says that if A person saw in a dream that he was entering a church and crying loudly inside. This vision shows that the dreamer is suffering from a major problem, and this vision shows increasing pressures and many burdens on the dreamer, such as crying. In the church, it indicates the imprisonment of the man. Al-Nabulsi says: If a man sees the church in his dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer is suffering from severe distress and suffers from many problems. But if a person sees in his dream a funeral procession leaving the church, then this vision appears as a distance from the person. Religion and this vision show many problems because of its distance from God. Interpretation of seeing the church in an unmarried girl’s dream: Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees the church in her dream, this vision indicates that she will get married soon, but she will suffer from imprisonment and severe pain. In her married life. If an unmarried girl sees a priest in her dream, this vision indicates the presence of a person who is very interested in her and her circumstances, but if she sees that the high priest in the church has died, this vision indicates a delay. Marriage. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is getting married in a church, then this vision indicates a new promotion if she is working, but if she is not working, then this vision indicates that she will get married soon. Interpretation of seeing a church in a married woman’s dream: Dream interpretation jurists say that Seeing a church in a married woman’s dream bodes well, as it indicates that she will give birth soon, but if she is pregnant, this vision indicates that she will give birth to a boy.

title: Interpretation of seeing planes falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Planes falling in a dream: We are often exposed to seeing planes falling in a dream, whether we are one of their passengers or watching their fall from a distance, but this vision affects the same viewer and makes him feel more stressed and disturbed as a result of multiple fears about the future. Events, what may await him in terms of shocks and unpleasant news, and knowing the correct interpretation and meanings of this dream can be read in the following lines, because they will include the opinions of leading scholars in the interpretation of aircraft falling through us. Website. Airplanes falling in a dream. Airplanes falling indicates that the person has been exposed to them a lot or to a strong shock in his life, which causes him to lose the joy of life, and something inside him is damaged or broken, and it is difficult for him to return to what it was. Empty and lonely, and there are other cases in which a person goes through financial problems that exceed his ability to bear, accumulates debts, and enters into a spiral of anguish and sorrow. Airplane crashes lead to the emergence of some negative changes in a person’s life, which are sudden and rapid, and therefore he cannot prepare to face them or Avoid part of its risks, but despite the many explanations and indicators that do not do so. It is good to see, but it promises the dreamer that his current crisis will not last long, but that relief will come to him soon and his life will return to normal so that he can enjoy peace and mental tranquility. As for the plane falling in front of the dreamer in a dream, it is a warning to him of the necessity of stopping the sins and immoralities that he commits in his real life. Because obsession with her will lead him to the path of failure and mirage. He must always remember that the world is perishing and that the Day of Resurrection and punishment will come from God Almighty, so he must hasten to repent and resort to approaching God Almighty by performing religious duties and doing good deeds voluntarily. Airplanes falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned to us many Interpretations directly related to seeing planes falling, especially if they result in loss of life or loss of life, and the plane crash is an indication of the difficulty and harshness of the current situation. The viewer's circumstances, and most likely it is related to his failure to achieve his dreams and aspirations, so he feels a failure and despair becomes his companion. Hearing loud voices from passengers when the plane crashes as a result of a feeling of panic and panic confirms the negative thoughts and obsessions that are running in the viewer's mind about his future life, as he is always preoccupied with what frightens and terrifies him. . It distracts him from progress and achievements. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that the plane crashing and falling before the eyes of the person seeing it is a warning of his gross negligence in the religious duties required of him and his distance from all actions that bring him closer to God Almighty. He loses his feelings of compassion and kindness, which makes him unfair to his family and falls far away in the womb relationship. He must re-examine himself before it is too late. Airplanes falling in a single woman’s dream. A plane crash in a person’s dream indicates that she is exposed to many problems and disagreements with those around her, and that she has passed With many dilemmas and difficulties that hinder his survival

title: Interpretation of a dream about a lavender tree

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a tulip tree by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about tulips Blooming in a dream indicates the beginning of a new life filled with many positives. If you dream of seeing tulip in a dream during its season, this indicates the goodness and benefit that the dreamer will receive. Dreaming of cutting tulips is considered a sign of unpleasant events that he will experience The dreamer. Interpretation of seeing lavender for Nabulsi: Seeing him eating and eating lavender leaves while they are in season is evidence of the good sayings that the fortuneteller says about some people. Seeing yourself eating lavender can also indicate many benefits and goodness. Lavender in a dream is generally considered a sign of hope and optimism. That the dreamer exists. Seeing a lavender tree for singles. Seeing a large group of white tulips is a sign of a lot of money that you will get. What if he sees in a dream? A lavender tree is yellow, it means that you hear a lot of good news. For an unmarried girl, seeing A lavender tree with withered leaves is a sign of unpleasant events and an indicator of unpleasant events. Interpretation of a dream about a lavender tree for a married woman: A married woman dreams of seeing lavender in silver color, indicating the happiness, pleasure and intense joy that she will have. If he sees a purple lavender tree, this indicates the fulfillment of Goals and dreams. Seeing a dream about a lavender tree for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that she is cutting down a lavender tree, this indicates some problems that she will encounter during childbirth. But if the pregnant woman has a person in exile and she sees in a dream a bunch of lavender leaves, this is evidence of the return of this expatriate. Lavender in a man’s dream. If a man sees in a dream that you smell yellow lavender in a dream, this indicates that you will meet a sick woman. But if he sees that he is collecting a lot of white tulip leaves, this is an indication of a lot of money that he will get soon. Add the dream that you would like to interpret. By referring to the marital status in a comment below the article, we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone I know I love

preview.html: In this article, we shed light on several cases in which you see a dream about someone you know and respect, and each case has more than one interpretation. It arose from a summary of the experiences of translators and scholars in the field of dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a person I know that I love for single people. Among the dreams that a single woman sees in her dream is that someone admires her. What and has a relationship with him or knows him. We mention some cases in which an unmarried woman sees this dream, and they are as follows: Seeing a girl in a dream that someone admires and loves her can indicate the bright life that the girl will live. The good news that she will hear soon will make her happy. If an unmarried woman sees a stranger in her dream, Rajab, who admires her, this is a sign that she will soon divorce him. If the person she sees is a person of good character and good behavior, this is evidence of contentment and happiness with him. And when an unmarried woman sees in a dream someone she knows and respects, she asks for her hand in marriage. It is an indication of her success in life, her relationship with others at work, and her ability to be creative at work in order to advance. Seeing a strange man in a dream for a good-looking single woman is a sign of her reaching a high position in her society and among her friends. Interpretation of a dream about someone I know I love For a married woman: This dream can also be found in a married woman’s dream and has a different interpretation than seeing it in a single woman’s dream. We list some of these indicators as follows: If a married woman sees a strange man in her dream, and he desires it, this means that this woman will hear new news soon. And that her husband will be very successful in his professional and family life. And if a married woman sees a man she knows who desires If a married woman sees a strange, malicious man approaching her and lusting after her, this is evidence of her troubled relationship with her husband. Their marital and family relationship must be examined so that the marital home does not collapse. A married woman dreams of a strange man in A dream and he looked at her and looked handsome, and the interpretation of this is that her next life will be for the better. Seeing a stranger trying to attack and attack her is evidence that she will die soon as a result of a serious illness. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of dreams of a man looking at me with admiration for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about someone I know that I love about a divorced woman. We come To the case in which a person admires a divorced woman and she knows him and appears to her in a dream with many interpretations, including: where the final vision of a man in a dream with a beautiful appearance and good characteristics. In this case, it indicates the good that will come to her, and many problems that will disappear soon. And seeing in a dream someone she knows. title: Interpretation of a dream about a naked brother in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my naked brother in a dream. In case you are asking, dear reader, about the interpretation of a dream about my naked brother in a dream, according to what scholars have narrated, all of this and more to see a brother in a naked situation...Interpretation of a dream about a naked brother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my naked brother in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that, but Seeing someone you know completely naked in a dream could be a sign of exaggeration on the part of the dreamer, and God knows best. Also, seeing a naked person in a dream could mean that the person is uncomfortable, and God knows what is not visible. If the dreamer sees a naked person in a dream, he can express the downfall of some... Secrets, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my brother who returned from a trip in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about my brother who returned from a trip in a dream can be exceeded. About repentance from sins and transgressions, and God knows the whole unseen. If the dreamer sees a person returning from a trip, this may indicate resolving disputes with him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees a person receiving a traveler in a dream, this may lead to achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees that she is receiving a person From a trip in a dream, this may represent her ability to achieve goals, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my brother returning to his ex-wife in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my brother returning to his ex-wife in a dream can lead to a person’s desire to return to his wife, and God knows all that he does not see, in the event that the dreamer sees a return to his wife. After divorce in a dream, this may be evidence of getting rid of differences between them and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Likewise, if the dreamer sees himself returning to his divorced wife in a dream, this may lead to receiving some good news, and God knows the unseen. Also, returning to the woman after divorce could It serves as an alleviation of debts and their repayment, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my brother vomiting in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my brother vomiting in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing a sinful person vomiting in a dream could be a sign of repentance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a stranger vomiting in a dream, This may indicate the relief that he feels, God willing. If the dreamer sees someone he knows vomiting, this may lead to lying, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my brother swimming in the sea in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my brother swimming in the sea in a dream may mean that he will be able to achieve some of the things he strives for, and God knows best. Top I knowIf a married man sees someone swimming in the sea in a dream, this may be evidence of things that make him feel happy, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees someone swimming in the sea, this may mean that she will obtain some benefits, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees In a dream, someone is swimming in the sea, so this could be a sign of happiness and overcoming problems and obstacles, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about death in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of death for the livingInterpretation of a dream of the death of someone I knowThe death of a father in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of death by Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreams of the death of a motherDeath in a dream for someone close to Ibn SirinNews of death in a dreamThe death of a brother in a dreamAnd whoever dreams that he died and then came back to life, he commits a sin and then repents for the Almighty’s saying: “Our Lord, You killed us twice and raised us twice, so we confess our sins.”And whoever dies without illness or appearance, and whoever dies, his life will be prolonged and his scholar will be shrouded and his religion will be corrupted.And whoever dreams of the death of the Imam, the city will be destroyed, and the destruction of the city is evidence of the death of the Imam.And it was said: Whoever sees a dead person dying a new death, it is the death of the man after him and his family, until the dead person becomes as if he has died a second time. And he saw that he was buried in this state without preparations and he does not cry and does not attend his funeral, then what was demolished will not be rebuilt unless it falls into the hands of someone else. And if he dreams that he died naked on the ground, he is poor, news of the corruption of his religion and the righteousness of his world. And if he dreams of the death of his son, he has been freed from his enemy from the reindeer or Noah, because he gives birth to a son who pleases him. It is said that the dream of the death of a bachelor is evidence of marriage, and the death of a married man is evidence of divorce, because with death the separation falls, and the same in the dream of one of the partners is evidence of that. His death. The division of his partner. A group of hypocrites who command them to do good, but they do not obey his command. God Almighty said: Do not listen to the dead. And whoever dreams that he met them dead, then he died in heresy or a journey from which he did not return, then the dead person is around his neck and gets a lot of money and good, and if the dead person eats his life, then seeing the dead and the death of the ruler is evidence of his isolation and the drunkenness of the dead person does not improve. And if he sees a dead person as if he is alive, then he takes his assumptions after corruption, and follows the difficulty from where he does not expect. And if he sees the dead happy, then this indicates the good condition of his condition with God Almighty, because they are in the house of truth. And if he sees a dead person who recognizes him and tells him that he is not dead, then this indicates the condition of the dead person in the future, according to the Almighty’s saying: {Indeed, they are alive with their Lord. , with the presence of some kind of torment, such a dream indicates the good condition of the deceased in the afterlife, and it also shows his effects in the world. And if he sees a dead person laughing, he will be forgiven from the words of God Almighty: {The faces on that Day will smile and laugh and smile} And it was said: Whoever sees a dead person hitting him, then at that time. Required by religion. And if he was poor, it is his poverty on good deeds, if they grieved, or defiled their clothes, and became poor, and committed obscenity. And if he saw in a famous cemetery the dead rose from it, then the people of that place are in pain and appear in it hypocrites, but the Muslim did not die, and so on if he saw the face of the dead. The blackness of a person for the Almighty’s saying: “As for those whose faces have been blackened, will you not believe after your belief?” The dead man is busy or tired, this is his work with all his might. And if he dreams that his grandfather and grandmother are alive, then this is the life of the grandfather and the fortune teller. And if he dreams that his mother has returned to life, then he will see comfort from within, and the same is the case if he sees his father alive, but the vision of the father is stronger. And whoever dreams like his dead brother. He lived, then he will be strengthened after weakness for the Almighty’s saying: (Strengthen my burden with him). If he sees his uncle or aunt alive, then something comes out of his hand. He sees that

title: Seeing garlic in a dream and the interpretation of eating garlic in a dream

preview.html: Great dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, agree that garlic in a dream is generally disliked, except in a few cases in which a dream about garlic may indicate goodness and eating garlic in a dream. A sick person symbolizes recovery, while the smell of garlic in a dream can indicate ostracism from people due to a shameful act. Roasted garlic in a dream is a useful medicine or makes money easy, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that garlic in a dream indicates the entry of money to the dreamer, and seeing garlic in a dream indicates bad and hateful words, and whoever sees that he is eating garlic in a dream is an outcast. From his family because of a word. For healing and goodness, and seeing garlic in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is not good, unless it is cooked, and God knows best. Although Ibn Sirin did not delve into the interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream, he quoted the following story in his book Maktoob Al-Kalam fi Interpretation of Dreams: It is said A man came to Abu Hurairah and told him about a dream. The dreamer said: “I saw in my dream that the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, was sitting in a mosque and people were greeting him, and when I came to greet him, men with whips prevented me from him, and when I asked them for the Messenger to enter. May God’s prayers and peace be upon him. They told me that you ate garlic, then they expelled me! Cooked in a dream can indicate repentance and avoiding sin, and the dream of eating fried garlic symbolizes a person’s reputation for what he hates, and it is said that fried garlic in a dream shows a lot of words without action, and seeing roasted garlic symbolizes a little money that is easy to obtain or A useful treatment. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says that eating garlic in a dream is only beneficial to the sick and there is no benefit to the rest. Garlic in a dream can indicate overwhelming worries and sorrows, and seeing garlic with onions in a dream symbolizes people’s retirement after a scandal. Interpretation of eating garlic in a dream and a dream Swallowing garlicAs we mentioned, eating garlic in a dream indicates suspicious and unpleasant money in the dream under any circumstances except for the sick person. It is said that eating garlic in a dream indicates that the dreamer is committing a great sin and violating the religion and Sunnah, according to the saying of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace: And whoever Eat from this tree - that is, garlic - and do not approach our mosque. The interpretation of swallowing garlic in a dream could indicate forbidden money and eating the money of orphans. Swallowing garlic in a dream may mean that the dreamer will remain silent about his sin and turn a blind eye to forbidden money. Garlic is taken with other things. Foods, vegetables or fruits, and their type is taken into account. The interpretation of the dream of eating garlic with honey in a dream is that the fortuneteller mixes halal money with haraam money and eats garlic with honey in a dream for one person, which is that he marries a beautiful woman, but her words are ugly, and she... Behavior is bad, and perhaps eating garlic with honey indicates that the fortuneteller follows heresy in religion and has good intentions.

title: Interpretation of a traveler’s dream in a dream

preview.html: When I dreamed of a person who is absent from you and returns from traveling, single, married, pregnant, divorced, married and single, with the husband returning to his home, I dreamed that my husband was traveling and much more about Ibn Sirin. The meaning of the traveler in the dream in general. If the traveler in the dream is a relative or loved one, then meeting him In a dream, it is considered good and joyful news, and accordingly he is praised to see him smiling, and in the interpretation it is also praised to kiss him or embrace him and receive him. Al-Azhari says: The journey is called a journey because it reveals the faces and manners of the travelers, thus revealing what was hidden from them. Through this linguistic interpretation of the word journey or traveler, it becomes clear to us that seeing someone in a dream as if he were traveling or returning from a trip, tells us the essence of these people and their nature. . But if the traveler shows you feelings of indifference, alienation, or neglect, then this is a sign of the evil that he hides in his heart. Interpretation of seeing a traveler in one dream: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream, as if a foreigner has returned from his travels and she welcomes him well or in an atmosphere of bliss and pleasure, then this An indication that he hears good or happy news. However, if the girl sees in her dream that the traveler she receives is angry, frowning, or angry, this indicates some problems or difficulties that she may face at the present time, especially on the family, social, and perhaps emotional levels. Then she must reconsider some of her actions towards her family members or friends. Interpretation of seeing a traveler in a married woman’s dream: A married woman often sees herself saying goodbye to her traveling husband in a dream, and this indicates her strong attachment to him or her fear of separating from him. As for the woman who sees... Her dream is that her traveling or arriving husband returns from his travels, laden with bags and gifts, as it may herald a happy event, especially if she dreams of her traveling husband returning with a smile or a bright look. A dream in this context may relate to a desire that can actually be fulfilled, whether in the field of livelihood, childbearing, or anything else that a married woman hopes to achieve or accomplish. We should also point out that some dreams related to the husband’s return or return from a trip are often self-talk. , because in this case the woman may long to see him or really wait for his return, so the subconscious brings her. That's it. Scenes that relieve her somewhat from the anguish of separation. Interpretation of a traveler returning from his pole in a pregnant woman’s dream. The dream of returning from exile or returning from a trip is usually associated with safety and security because we often associate it with this in our collective imagination. One of the signs of a dream that indicates health security related to pregnancy, the fetus, and childbirth. A dream about the return of a traveler, if he is close, indicates the earliest date of birth or a good sign indicating the termination of pregnancy and pain. The return of the absent, lost, and scattered in a man’s dream. A man who dreams that he has someone who traveled to If a foreigner returns for a period of time returning from his travels, it portends happiness if the expatriate returns in the dream smiling, happy or happy. The name Saleh, for example, denotes justice and prosperity, and Al-Hassan denotes the meaning of goodness.

title: Interpretation of seeing a person being beaten in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and its most important meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a person being beaten in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and its most important meanings. This vision is one of the visions in which the interpretation differs from what appears in it. The dream is about being guilty, and this varies depending on the instrument with which the beating was done, whether it was by hand, with a stick, or with a whip. Interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi being beaten in a dream. There are many dreams that have interpretations that are controlled by the circumstances in which the dreamer lives, as seeing being beaten has many negative connotations. And sometimes it is undesirable and positive, and Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi interpreted it as follows: In interpreting the vision of a person in a dream, what Ibn Shirin says is that it benefits both the attacked person and the afflicted person. Except in some cases in which beating is a sign of negative and undesirable things. Al-Nabulsi continues to interpret this vision as saying that the best beating in a dream is the one in which the sleeper sees himself being beaten, but he does not know how he was beaten, and in this case it brings money or goodness. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a yellow snake chasing me in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of beating in The dream by Ibn ShaheenAs for Ibn Shaheen, he interpreted this dream with many interpretations in which many effects of evil and some good appeared, according to the aspects of the dream that control the interpretation of this dream in the dream, and Ibn Sirin said about that. The interpretation of this dream is as follows: There can be benefit from seeing being beaten in a dream if one knows who is hitting him. However, if the beating was with a whip or calamity and was not accompanied by blood, then this indicates the consumption of forbidden money. Fear of being beaten in a dream indicates safety. And the dreamer is safe. And whoever sees a dead person beating him in a dream, this is good news for him, and it may be work or travel. And whoever sees in a dream that he is knocking on a dead person, he will improve his religion and pay off his debts. As for whoever sees that he is beating a dead person in his dream, and that dead person was satisfied and did not object to That beating, this is an indication of his good condition in the afterlife. The dream has a general benefit. The vision can indicate good advice or advice and it can indicate change. The interpretation of seeing others being beaten in a dreamThe interpretation of seeing a person being beaten in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, It includes many benefits that come from being a hitter. He promises him goodness and benefit, but he does not fulfill these promises, as Al-Nabulsi believes that hitting in a dream is a sign of supplication, and whoever hits someone else while he is tied, it indicates that that person is praying against him. In reality, beatings in a dream generally indicate change and good preaching. Beating is very harmful and this change is for the worse. Interpretation of seeing being beaten to death in a dream Beating to death is one of the methods of torture that some people apply in normal life, and it is a very frightening thing for many people, which makes some see this dream in a dream, and searching for its interpretation and explanation becomes an important issue. . It has been interpreted as follows: Whoever sees that he is hitting someone in a dream, this means that the killer benefits the injured person, and whoever sees that he is hitting others with his hand or with a whip, this indicates that the aggressor sees the result of the benefit that he provides.
